titles.title: Stop COVID Act of 2020
To amend the Foreign Sovereign Immunities Act to establish an exception to jurisdictional immunity for a foreign state that discharges a biological weapon, and for other purposes.
Stop China-Originated Viral Infectious Diseases Act of 2020
Stop COVID Act of 2020

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
Stop China-Originated Viral Infectious Diseases Act of 2020 or the Stop COVID Act of 2020
This bill limits the immunity of foreign states from suit in the United States.
Specifically, it bars immunity for a foreign state in cases where the foreign state, whether intentionally or unintentionally, discharges a biological weapon in the United States or that results in the bodily injury of a U.S. citizen.
